text: Ezɨ Judas, gumazir Iesus isava apanibar agharim gatɨzim, a garima me paza Iesus gamuava a isa kotiam garɨgha, egha ghaze, an aremegham. Ezɨ Judas gara ghaze, kɨ uabɨ arazir kuram gami. Egha uan nɨghnɨzibagh ira. Egha dagɨar silvan 30 plan ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba ko Judan gumazir dapaniba a ganɨngiziba inigha ua me danɨngasa zui.
